sentence.Network_en: The trigonometric functions are defined for right triangles.

sentence.Network_en: We might prefer to stick to trigonometric functions.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们可能宁愿拘泥于使用三角函数.

sentence.Network_en: The trigonometric terms should be changed by the substitution of the equations involving the double angles.
sentence.Network_cn: 用倍角公式代换三角函数项.
